text: Manuhara babe tara sanmukhata arau pichata etara pichata etakai agamanakarai praharai ache, sihamte allahara adesata tara raksanabeksana karae. Niscaya allahe kono sampradayara arastha paraibartana nakarae yetiya laike sihamte nije'i nijara arastha paraibartana nakarae. Lagate kono sampradayara babe yadi allahe asubha kiba iccha karae tente seya pratiraodha karaa sambhara nahaya arau te'omra bahirae sihamtara kono abhibharaka na'i
